name: Gamebook Edgar A. Poe: The Oval Portrait
name_original: Gamebook Edgar A. Poe: The Oval Portrait
description:
The wisdom that we get from the “already told” stories makes us deeply feel that we cannot hide from the inevitable (*).
⠀
⠀

Be an active participant in a story true to the original.

Play the role intended for you by the master Edgar A. Poe. and uncover the dark secret behind the portrait of a muse.

The show must go on... in the right way.

Make choices and follow the illustrative sounds and music.

Images arise and disappear in the fumes of the gothic atmosphere.

Experience the story as realistically as your imagination allows you to.
